name: Blocking Colors
description:
Cubey, our protagonist, has to save the world from Poliglot's claws, an evil dodecahedron who wants to cause mass chaos stealing The Colour Cones. Poliglot and its minions want to end the world as we all know it, will Cubey and its cannon Cannonube be able to stand up against the evil forces that are attacking Terrangle?

This is a little project made by us, Alfons Pastor, Ramsés Sánchez and Carlos Franco in 3 months. We tried our to deliver a fun but difficult game, and even if there are some bugs, it's still really likable.

Controls: Space to jump, long press for a higher jump, click to shoot.
